pitch.hero_subtitle:
From knowing about God
to truly knowing Him together.
pitch.crisis_subtitle:
Many know about God, but don't truly know Him.
We bridge the gap from passive knowledge to active, shared faith.
pitch.danger_point_1: Creates a false sense of maturity
pitch.danger_point_2: Puts passive knowledge over active faith
pitch.danger_point_4: Leads to a lack of genuine relationship with Christ
pitch.vision_title:
Our Vision: A Living Walk,
Not a Program
pitch.vision_quote: The fear of the LORD is the beginning of wisdom, and the knowledge of the Holy One is insight.
pitch.vision_subtitle: We nurture a genuine walk with God: from knowledge, to practice, to shared experience.
pitch.pathway_subtitle: Guiding users from cultural curiosity to genuine discipleship.
pitch.step_1_content: Engage with beautiful art, music, and history as a non-threatening entry point.
pitch.step_2_content: Shift focus from "what" to "why" to spark deeper, reflective thought.
pitch.step_3_content: Optional prompts connect truths to personal life, bridging knowledge and experience.
pitch.step_4_content: Users naturally click their way from aesthetics to doctrine.
pitch.step_5_content: Each topic has levels: Surface, Intermediate, and Deep. Users choose their depth.
pitch.step_6_content: Quizzes and spaced repetition ensure users actively learn and retain core truths.
pitch.step_7_content: Users discuss what they're learning, asking real questions to solidify understanding.
pitch.step_8_content: Follow-ups on personal application goals provide encouragement to turn intention into action.
pitch.cta_subtitle: Help us transform passive knowledge into active, vibrant faith.
